snippet.title: Ween: The Prophecy (1993) Longplay [Full]
snippet.description:
Full longplay of the game "Ween: The Prophecy" released in 1993 by Sierra On-Line.

A little goofy and has a bat that eats fruit to poop out some gold for you...

Somewhat equivalent to the "escape the room" genre of flash games today, pixel hunt for items on the screen and use them to make it to the next level.  I think it has really good music.

Stay tuned to this new channel for more ABANDONWARE longplays!
